tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_sensor_data (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id UUID,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CropYieldPrediction (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT,
    crop_type VARCHAR,
    yield_prediction INT,
    prediction_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES WeatherStationData(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_station_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
);
CREATE TABLE climate_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region VARCHAR(50),
    average_temperature FLOAT,
    average_humidity FLOAT,
    average_wind_speed FLOAT,
    analysis_date DATE,
);
CREATE TABLE crop_yield_prediction (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    predicted_yield INT,
    prediction_date DATE,
);

CREATE TABLE climate_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_id INT,
  temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
  humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES weather_station(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_sensor (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  yield_id INT,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  data FLOAT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (yield_id) REFERENCES crop_yield(yield_id)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_station ( 
  weather_station_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  location VARCHAR(255), 
  region VARCHAR(100), 
  altitude INT, 
  temperature FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE climate_data ( 
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  date DATE, 
  time TIME, 
  weather_station_id INT, 
  humidity FLOAT, 
  pressure FLOAT, 
  rainfall FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE crop_yield ( 
  yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  crop_name VARCHAR(100), 
  season VARCHAR(50), 
  expected_yield INT, 
  actual_yield INT 
);

CREATE TABLE soil_data ( 
  soil_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  location VARCHAR(255), 
  soil_type VARCHAR(50), 
  ph_level FLOAT, 
  mineral_content FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecast ( 
  forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  date DATE, 
  time TIME, 
  weather_station_id INT, 
  temperature FLOAT, 
  rainfall_probability FLOAT 
);
